title: Detecting Emotion Drift in Mental Health Text Using Pre-Trained Transformers
summary: This study investigates emotion drift: the change in emotional state across a single text, within mental health-related messages. While sentiment analysis typically classifies an entire message as positive, negative, or neutral, the nuanced shift of emotions over the course of a message is often overlooked.
